definition: abbr. for Xiamen or Amoy 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2], Fujian

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Prof Deng obtained his MA and PhD degrees in Accounting from Xiamen University.
sentences.chinese: 鄧教授先後於廈門大學會計系獲得其碩士及博士學位。

sentences.english: The Proceedings of ICCSE 2008(with CD) have been published by Xiamen University Press officially.
sentences.chinese: 論文集與論文CD已經交由廈門大學出版社正式出版。

sentences.english: Xiamen Island, where Xiamen University is located, is known as "a Garden on the Sea".
sentences.chinese: 廈門大學所在的廈門島素有“海上花園”之稱。

sentences.english: This paper introduces two models for interpreter training: Daniel Gile' s Model and the Xiamen University Mod- el.
sentences.chinese: 本文通過對吉爾口譯訓練模式與廈門大學。

sentences.english: Was appointed literature chief 1926 to Xiamen University.
Xiamen University is considered as the most beautiful and romantic campus in China.
sentences.chinese: 廈門大學被看做是中國最美麗和浪漫的校園。

sentences.english: On the first day, we visited to Xiamen University and Nanputuo Temple.
sentences.chinese: 第一天，我們參觀了廈門大學和南普陀寺。

sentences.english: The nice seventh of Xiamen University academy is in Hubei admitting the former years the fraction is many?
sentences.chinese: 廈門大學嘉庚學院在湖北往年的錄取分數是多少？

sentences.english: Which Singaporean was once the president of Xiamen University (University of Amoy)?
sentences.chinese: 哪一位新加坡人在廈門大學當過校長？

definition: Jinan University in Guangdong Province, with 4 campuses in Guangzhou, Shenzhen and Zhuhai
abbr. for 臺灣大學|台湾大学[Tai2 wan1 Da4 xue2]
Suzhou or Soochow University (Suzhou, PRC since 1986)
Beijing Normal University/abbr. for 北京師範大學|北京师范大学[Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2]
Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists
Fu Jen Catholic University of Peking (from 1925), forerunner of Beijing Normal University 北京師範大學|北京师范大学/Fu Jen Catholic University in New Taipei City, Taiwan
Soochow University (Suzhou, PRC from 1900-1952)/Soochow University (Taipei, Taiwan since 1954)
University of Electronic Science and Technology of China
pinyin: Dian4 zi3 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2
